sprint_goal: Establish the core secure transformation engine and its foundational security model, including encryption and sandboxing.
Implement the basic script management UI, including the rich code editor, and the core data handling pipeline with size limits and violation logging.
Develop the interactive script preview functionality and introduce script versioning to enhance the administrator's workflow and safety.
Add advanced features and operational improvements, including live data preview, Prometheus metrics, and built-in helper functions.
